title: Designing Quantitative Methodology Selection Strategies for Adult Learners

context.prior_knowledge: Experience in basic statistics and data analysis
context.additional_context: Advanced domain experts in managerial/leadership roles enhancing quantitative methodology course selection competencies through practice-based assessment in mixed-grade learning environments

learning_goals: Within six months, learners can identify assessment methods (practical/theoretical) matching their learning style and work requirements with 80% accuracy when selecting quantitative methodology courses
Learners can analyze the impact of interaction in mixed-grade environments on learning outcomes and apply findings to their educational planning (≥70%)
Through ≥3 practical evaluation simulations, learners can select and implement data analysis methodologies applicable to real work environments
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
